NVIDIA® PhysX® SDK for PS4 ReadMe

Requirements:

  • ORBIS SDK 2.508.051 or later.

Location of Binaries:

  • SDK LIBs: Lib/

Building SDK Source with Visual Studio:

  • Visual Studio Solutions are in Source/compiler/

Building Snippets with Visual Studio:

  • Visual Studio Solutions are in Snippets/compiler/
  • It's required to build the PhysX SDK prior to building Snippets, as described above.
  • Choose the required snippet in Visual Studio with "Set As StartUp Project".
  • In the chosen snippet project search for "PVD_HOST" and set the corresponding address to be the address of the computer used to run Visual Studio.
  • In Visual Studio build either just the chosen shippet project or all snippets.

Running Snippets With Visual Studio:

  • Start PVD to allow record and playback of the scene simulated by the chosen snippet.
  • Run the snippet from Visual Studio with F5.
  • The scene executed in the snippet can be reviewed in PVD.

Known Issues:

  • The SDK samples have not been ported to PS4.
